website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around 10-inch subwoofer option you can use in a variety of locations beyond the car.
pros: Specifically designed to be installed in many different types of vehicles including cars and boats
Durable with semi-waterproof and weatherproof construction
Great sound production when paired with other high-quality speakers and subwoofers
cons: Best results require a little bit of tinkering with the audio settings to get right

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio 10"
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought some Pyle 10's, but with my truck didn't have the exaggerated ft3 of Air for them to hit properly, so I ended up buying these. These are nice heavy little speakers, you can tell they are made of quality without even looking at the logo and expecting polk to be what it is already. Packaged well, and these lil' guys drive hard for you. They hit so nicely in a sealed box, and don't miss a beat. I am happy qwith these, I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: It fits almost perfect and it sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I used this driver to replace the driver in a Infinity SSW-10. I wired it so as to be a 2 ohm driver as the old driver read 1.8 ohms. Close enough. It fits almost perfect and it sounds great. Hard hitting and very punchy. Works well with the existing amp in the SSW-10. I was thinking about replacing the old foam surround in the old driver but for a few dollars more I got this driver and I believe it is a better higher quality driver with a rubber surround that should last for many years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Audio Nut

customer_reviews.title: and this sub sounds better than the Rockford Fosgate I had
customer_reviews.text: I wired this Polk Audio 10 parallel in a tune ported box, and this sub sounds better than the Rockford Fosgate I had. Bass is clear and deep. Now let's see if it'll last longer than the Fosgate. Hopefully I don't have to change my rating for this sub.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ... in a 10" sealed sub enclosure and it looks like it will thump pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a 10" sealed sub enclosure and it looks like it will thump pretty good. Have not hooked it up yet but nice and heavy with high quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: With the sunroof open it hits hard enough to stun ...
customer_reviews.text: With the sunroof open it hits hard enough to stun a low flying duck while also maintaining crisp, clear un muddled bass. Solid 10/10 for me on price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SPEAKER !
customer_reviews.text: This speaker absolutely met my expectations it sounds awsome And the price was awsome I will absolutely recommended this to any one looking buy it you won't be sorry !
customer_reviews.author: jeeperscrepers

customer_reviews.title: I've bought them before and loved them
customer_reviews.text: this one was not as pleasant! the basket had small dent in it and i thought it would be OK but the voice coil rubbed on the pole making audible noise ! i purchased DB series Here at amazon at least 20 times with great satisfaction AMAZON AND THE SELLER BIG PLUS THEY TOOK THE ITEM BACK AND PAID FOR RETURN SHIPPING !!!!!! i still gave it 5 stars because of one speaker that could be damaged at the factory or in transit is not worth ruining overall satisfaction of the series!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Palgume

customer_reviews.title: For the price, these are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, look great and really hit. Especially if you are considering great sound for your car and not just bass where you cant hear the music at all. These complimented my kenwoods perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brad A. Basinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave five stars because there was no option for six.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy and it sounds clean
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer exceeded my expectations for the price. Installation was easy and it sounds clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub
customer_reviews.text: The sub works great, good quality, and sounds awesome. I had a cheap sub in my setup and it didn't com close to the way this sub sounds.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Even out the sound on my truck
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with speaker and the packing it came in. It was on time and well protected. The sound in my truck has finally got some balance with some strong bass.
customer_reviews.author: JRB III

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: No issues other than the speaker is a tiny bit larger than a standard DB sub this size from Polk. I had some trouble getting the outside lip to fit where it was mounted due to that. Otherwise no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alligator Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... coming from a JL 10w6 prior to these was amazing. These didn't put out good bass at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these powered by a 600 watt mono amp and the sound quality coming from a JL 10w6 prior to these was amazing. These didn't put out good bass at all but that's what you get for a cheaper sub. Perhaps if I powered them by a larger amp they would have sounded better....
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with my Polk Audio purchase.it met and exceeded my expectations!I was impressed with the quality and weight of the subwoofer!I would definitely purchase more products from Polk Audio.The Subwoofer sounds Great and handles the bass like a Pro! Thanks again,moneybags1264
customer_reviews.author: Moneybags1265

customer_reviews.title: Bass is not good
customer_reviews.text: OK its cheap as I am using on a boat and it's exposed to the elements but you get what you pay for & bass is not tight and crisp ok it gives you a bass but not very good I WILL up grade to a better one.
customer_reviews.author: B. GILLING

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio rocks
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. After doing extensive research I decided to go with all Polk Audio in my boat. There's a very crisp and clear sound and I get a lot of compliments while I'm on the lake. I put in 4 six and a half inch Polk Audio and one 10 inch subwoofer and it sounds great. I also bought one Alpine amp 4-channel to push the six and a half's and one kicker mono amp to push the subwoofer and it drives them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: These knock just right for an adult
customer_reviews.text: When I was young I wanted to slam the biggest subs I could find go trumpet my arrival to a particular paring lot or neighborhood. As I've matured I appreciate quality of sound. These provide enough bump with lasting quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great sub - hit pretty hard for the money. I however didn't know how to properly wire a dual voice coil so I blew it...I had it hooked up to one voicecoil and it sounded great. I will not give it a low star rating for my mistake. Buy with confidence just make sure you hook it up correctly. I was sending about 280 RMS to it, with only 1 VoiceCoil hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: New is better than old
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great price! I had a pair of Pioneer HPM-40's that had bad woofers in them. I replaced them with these and they sound way better than the original drivers. My only complication is that the speakers flange is smaller than what was in he HPM-40's (circa 1976-1979) so I had to drill new holes and install a speaker gasket.
customer_reviews.author: SysArch

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding woofer for my car and home cinema also.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of the db1040s. One single coil version for Home cinema and two dual coli woofers as upgrade to my Challenger Hellcat factory woofers in the trunk. Today i finished my home cinema single coil db1040 Woofer - wood work and finish was the time consuming thing. Wow it sounds so great to my ears now. I will order a second one and build a identical home cinema woofer again.
customer_reviews.author: RoNNy379CH

customer_reviews.title: Really good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Really good bang for your buck. The dual voice coil feature let me get the most out of my amp.
customer_reviews.author: Tron

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I installed this subwoofer in a base G35 using the stock rear deck mounting location. Although this subwoofer is not specifically rated as a free air subwoofer, it sounds amazing and has plenty of bass. Build quality is fantastic as with all Polk products.
customer_reviews.author: Neo2000x

customer_reviews.title: Really has some impressive low-end for a small speaker. ...
customer_reviews.text: Really has some impressive low-end for a small speaker. I installed it in a custom cooler speaker system I built from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome DVC Subwoofer for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace the subwoofer in a Logitech Z5500 system. Had to wire the dual voice coils in series to achieve the 8ohm rating that the original Logitech subwoofer had. This subwoofer sounds better than the original Logitech and can be played at max volume within this system without issue!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Good subs
customer_reviews.text: These sound very good. Good thump for the money. Wired the coils in series, and two of these speakers in parallel for a bridged connection to 4ohm output on JL amp.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Clean Bass I am using a passive 100 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Very Clean Bass I am using a passive 100 Hz low pass crossover, to get only Bass and ported enclosure with a minimally ample 200 watt amp.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Marine Subwoofer.  Will see how it holds up in this environment.
customer_reviews.text: Great subwoofer. Will give further update after a few months on the boat. No grill in box. What is Polk thinking. I just took my old Clarion grill and velcro to the Polk. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I matched four 6" Polk Audio speakers with this sub using factory stereo and amps. My teenage sons crank it and so do I. It sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Mind blowing awesome. I installed 2 of these in the rear ...
customer_reviews.text: Mind blowing awesome. I installed 2 of these in the rear deck of a chrysler 300 woth a 1600 watt amp and all i can say is WOW
customer_reviews.author: kenney39

customer_reviews.title: Very excellent sub
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this Polk DB sub only a single 10 for the money its sound fantastic an hits really hard in my civic I have a kicker cx series 300 Watt amp wired at 2 ohms. The bass is silky smooth an deep.... if u want a good quality sub an dont want go broke.. GET THIS SUB YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: justin williams

customer_reviews.title: tight and on spot sound
customer_reviews.text: I am not an extreme audiophile, but i do like good sound and i don't settle for cheap sounding junk. This is my first Polk product and compared to all the other brands ive had (dual,pyle, kicker, pioneer and others), this is beast for a 270 watt 10". One of the tightest sounding subs, and the response from this sub is amazing, Very smooth transitions from low to high. And best thing is you can configure it to be multiple ohms (2-8 ohms selectable). I will be ordering another one for my jeep since its marine grade.
customer_reviews.author: E. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Polk 10"
customer_reviews.text: thess by far are one of the best subs ive ownd right up there with jl and Orion nice power handleing and sturdy design and require only .66 cube ft per sub so not alot of room wich makes it great for pepole with single cab trucks if your looking for clean deep base and a resnable price get ya a set of these you wont go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied. High recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great in my prius. I hooked it up to a Boss 1100 watt amp. Ported enclosure. And it sounds like there's two of them in there. Really nice quality. Really powerful. The wiring series is 8ohm, so there's so much more they can do if I want more power.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great Balance Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these subs to replace an older pair of polk audio subs that lasted me about 10 years. So far, so good. The sound quality if excellent and the bass is deep and clean. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Simms Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Havent really had a chance to hear how they sound. The amp wasnt right, I will redo another review, Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: wtrymetucker9

product_meta.title: Polk Audio db1040DVC 10-Inch Dual Voice Coil Subwoofer (Single, Black)
product_meta.description:
Sweatproof, inhibition of bacteria
With IPX7 waterproof standard, can waterproof and anti sweat, blocking the damage of sweat on the bluetooth earbud, which effectively prevent the growth of bacteria due to sweat.

Comfortable to wear
Bluetooth earphone with skin friendly ear hook, 15° humanized design more closely to ears, light and weightless. You can wear for a long time without feeling uncomfortable. It is more suitable for sport running and fitness.

High quality
Bluetooth V4.1 + EDR technology, you can enjoy real stereo and superb bass. Bluetooth headset noise reduction technology, can clear high volume and low volume, to provide the best wireless earbud sound. Built in microphone to answer incoming calls.

Up to 6 hours play time
The Bluetooth headset can be fully charged in just 2 hours and can work for up to 6 hours. The headset battery status will automatically be displayed on the IOS phone screen. When the battery is low, it can be charged in time.

Specification
Bluetooth Standard: Latest Bluetooth 4.1
Waterproof Rating: IPX7
Battery: Lithium ion Polymer
Working Range: 10M (max)
Playback / Talking Time: 5 6 hours
Charigng Time: 2 hours
Standby Time: 200 hours

Notes:
1.Blue and red light flashes alternatel when sports earphone pairing with new bluetooth devices.
2.Please allow some usage time difference for bluetooth headset because the exactly playback/talking time is depends on the volume level and audio content.
3.We do not recommend use the bluetooth earphone for swimming.
feature_bullets: A marine dual voice coil subwoofer speaker
Equipped with 10 inch black Dynamic Balance polymer composite cone
Power handling: 270 watts continuous, 540 watts peak
Marine certified Polk db Series speakers are built tough to withstand the toughest environments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars60 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
